    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public float[] solve(ALS.NormalEquation ne,
            double lambda)
        Solves a least squares problem with L2 regularization:

        min norm(A x - b)^2^ + lambda * n * norm(x)^2^

        Specified by:
        solve in interface ALS.LeastSquaresNESolver
        Parameters:
        ne - a ALS.NormalEquation instance that contains AtA, Atb, and n (number of instances)
        lambda - regularization constant, which will be scaled by n
        Returns:
        the solution x
